title: Beijing 2022 (Bonus): Martin Fourcade and Frida Hansdotter
description: A final bonus podcast from Beijing 2022. We catch up with five time Olympic champion biathlete Martin Fourcade of France about Paris 2024 plans. And we speak to Frida Hansdotter about her new position on the IOC Athletes' Commission.
